item.title: About
item.author: kunal.sumbly@gmail.com (Kunal Sumbly)
item.description: Hi, I’m Kunal Sumbly. Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years in banking and financial services industry. Experienced in implementing Enterprise Software Products. Customer-centric with expertise in customer-facing roles, working closely with clients from the inception of the project, through high-level and detailed design/implementation to launch and post-go-live support. Passionate about technology, proficient in different technical stacks in the Java Ecosystem, Cloud Computing , AWS and DevOps. Follow me on Github and Twitter.
